meanings.sent1: The dialoged friends chatted happily at the park.
meanings.sent2: The group had a dialoged meeting to plan the event.
meanings.sent3: The dialoged students debated about their favorite books.
meanings.sent4: The dialoged atmosphere in the room was warm and inviting.
meanings.sent5: The dialoged voices filled the room with excitement.

meanings.definition: Exchanged words or ideas with someone.
meanings.sent1: She dialoged with her friend about their weekend plans.
meanings.sent2: The team dialoged with the coach to improve their strategy.
meanings.sent3: The siblings dialoged playfully over who gets the last cookie.
meanings.sent4: The countries dialoged to reach a peaceful resolution.
meanings.sent5: The students dialoged animatedly during the class debate.
